sub_fields.label: Link Type
sub_fields.name: link_type
sub_fields.instructions: Optional permalink for the entire card.

sub_fields.label: Cards
sub_fields.message:
Dynamically add a card to your page by using the `card` block.

A card is a dynamic block that can contain both text and an image. You also turn each block into a linked block by populating the link fields.


Four 1/4 `card` blocks with white backgrounds

sub_fields.label: Galleries
sub_fields.message:
Dynamically add an image gallery to your page by using the `gallery` block.


A 1/3 `text area` block with a 2/3 `gallery` block

sub_fields.label: Images
sub_fields.message:
Dynamically add an image to your page by using the `image` block.


Two 1/2 `image` blocks, surrounded by two 1/1 `text area` blocks

sub_fields.label: Image Grid
sub_fields.message:
Quickly add stunning image grids to your page by using the `image grid` block.


A video block

sub_fields.label: Map
sub_fields.message:
Dynamically add an interactive Google map to your page by using the `map` block.


A 2/3 `map` block with a 1/3 `text area` block

sub_fields.label: oEmbeds
sub_fields.message:
Dynamically add embedded content to your page by using the `oEmbed` block. WordPress keep a list of supported oEmbed services on their website.


A 1/2 `oEmbed` block with a 1/2 `text area` block

sub_fields.label: Text Areas
sub_fields.message:
Dynamically add text blocks to your page by using the `text area` block.


Three 1/3 `text area` blocks

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: If a colour is selected when an image is used, you will get a colour overlay over your image.

sub_fields.label: Anchor Text
sub_fields.name: anchor_text
sub_fields.instructions: Anchor links will only appear if this field is populated.
